snippet: The encampment outside a bank had been set up in October and was tolerated by the police until Monday, when they dismantled tents after complaints of a rat infestation.
abstract: Police in riot gear dismantle tents at the Frankfurt Occupy encampment at the European Central Bank's doorstep in Frankfurt, ending months of tolerance for the camp, after complaints of a rat infestation.
lead_paragraph: The encampment outside a bank had been set up in October and was tolerated by the police until Monday, when they dismantled tents after complaints of a rat infestation.

headline.seo: Frankfurt Occupy Camp Cleared on Health Concerns
headline.main: Occupy’s Frankfurt Camp Is Closed as Health Hazard
headline.print_headline: Occupy’s Frankfurt Camp Is Closed as Health Hazard
